member.name: T:APSIM.Documentation.Bibliography.BibTeX
member.summary: Provides functionality for reading .bib (bibliography) files (http://www.bibtex.org/Format/)

member.name: F:APSIM.Documentation.Bibliography.BibTeX.contents
member.summary: The raw BibTeX contents
member.remarks: The entire .bib file is read into memory during the constructor, for each instance of this class, and is only released when the instance is finalized. Should consider alternative ways of handling this. As at Sep 2021, the .bib file is approx 2MB.

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Bibliography.BibTeX.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Bibliography.BibTeX.Lookup(System.String)
member.summary: Lookups the specified citation name and returns it.
member.param: Name of the citation to search for.
member.returns: Returns the found citation or null if not found.

member.summary: Field name for the axis - stored for error reporting purposes.

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Graphing.ExportedSeries.ThrowIfIncompatibleWith(APSIM.Documentation.Graphing.ExportedSeries)
member.summary: Check if this series is compatible with another series. That is, can the two series be displayed on the same graph. This could fail if, for instance, one series shows DateTime data on the x-axis but the other series shows numeric data on the x-axis.
member.param: The other series to check for compatibility.

member.name: T:APSIM.Documentation.Graphing.SmartDateTimeAxis
member.summary: This class extends OxyPlot's DateTimeAxis, with "better" formatting of axis tick labels and intervals.
member.remarks: Technically we could achieve the same result here without extending the DateTimeAxis class. However, doing so gives us convenient access to the min and max values being displayed on the axis.

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Graphing.SmartDateTimeAxis.CalculateInterval(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: This method provides a better axis tick resolution algorithm for date time axes. Returns an appropriate interval and format string for the given date range.
member.param: The earliest date displayed on the axis.
The latest date displayed on the axis.

member.name: T:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation
member.summary: This class documents a model's parameters, inputs, and outputs.

member.summary: Properties to exclude from the doc.

member.name: F:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.maxTypeLength
member.summary: The maximum length of a type name.

member.name: F:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.FLAGS
member.summary: Binding Flags used by reflection to get Properties, Fields, Events, Methods etc from types.

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.Document(Models.Core.IModel)
member.summary: Document a Model Interface into ITags
member.returns: A list of ITags with the documentation for this interface

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.DocumentType(System.Type)
member.summary: Document the specified model.
member.returns: An ITag section with the summary, remarks, outputs, links, events and methods for that type

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.GetTypes(Models.Core.IModel)
member.summary: Get all the types that should be documented for this model. This includes Properties and Fields within the same namespace.
member.returns: An array of types to be documented

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.GetParameterNames(Models.Core.IModel)
member.summary: Gets the list of parameter names for a model. If the model is a resource, it will load them from the resource.
member.returns: An array of string name for each of the parameters.

member.summary: Create and return a new Output object for member

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.GetOutputs(System.Type,System.String[])
member.summary: Create and return a new Output object for member

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.DocumentLinksEventsMethods(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets documentation tags for Links, Events and Methods for a type.
member.returns: An array of ITag section for each of the Links, Events and Methods to be documented

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.GetLinks(System.Type)
member.summary: Return a datatable of links for the specified type.

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.GetEvents(System.Type)
member.summary: Return a datatable of links for the specified type.

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.GetMethods(System.Type)
member.summary: Return a datatable of methods for the specified type.

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.GetTypeName(System.Type)
member.summary: Get a type name for the specified class member.
member.param: The type to get a name for.

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.ConvertPropertiesToDataTable(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Reflection.PropertyInfo},System.Object)
member.summary: Convert a list of properties in a DataTable
member.param: The list of properties to put into table.
The object to use for getting property values. If null, then no value column will be added.
member.returns: A datatable containing the content for the properties

member.name: M:APSIM.Documentation.Models.InterfaceDocumentation.ConvertToITags(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Convert a DataTable into an ITag table
member.returns: An ITag list with the table name in a paragraph and table as a sibling.
